Greetings to all. 

Five new swords have just been added to the web site. These include: 

Mino koto katana by Kanenobu

Published Gendai katana in the shape of the "little crow" by Murata Tsuneyoshi

Kaga Aoe koto katana by Iyetsugu

Tsukushi Ryokai koto tanto

Kai Mihara Koto Katana. 

Please take a look if you have any interest. 

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
